title: 06/21/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 06/21/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin loves the way the Suns have built their team counter to what people consider "modern basketball". He points out why Ben Simmons and the 76ers failed this post season and what they have in common with the other teams who came up short in the post season. He also tells you why he was right about Zion Williamson and wrong about Doc Rivers. Plus, NBA veteran Al Harrington joins the show to tell Colin what the 76ers need to do in order to fix Ben Simmons in the off season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
